Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2018 10:23PM Hmissy34 wrote: Hello all, I’m new to this page and I was a stage 1’er also who decided to go with a double Mastectomy as well. I felt that was best for me. The whole process was way too emotional and stressful. I just had part 2 of my reconstruction on 11/29/18, and looking forward to putting this whole thing behind me! By the way, I love this page and I hope everyone’s recovery goes well. ❤️
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
